column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=The sad thing is - the American people are losing in this battle .
#Text=Republicans are fighting against government interference in business ; Democrats are ( or should be ) fighting against business interference in government .
#Text=Ultimately , though , special interests are pumping so much money into the political scene that it seems the voice of the People is lost in the noise of business .

#Text=It seems that the media - especially the television media - have long ago figured out that the way to make their businesses work ( which , being commercial entities , they must , of course , do as well as they can ) requires ratings .
#Text=Ratings require getting people to watch .
#Text=Getting people to watch requires controversy .
#Text=And so , people like Glenn Beck - among many others - rise to become stars , because they can get ratings , which ultimately boil down to money .
#Text=The problem is that truth and compromise are boring , but exaggeration and controversy are exciting .

#Text=When I saw the thread on Fark , where one of the posters , in a thread about Sarah Palin announcing her support for Glenn Beck , said , " Why have n't we had an official response to the rumor that Glenn Beck raped and murdered a girl in 1990 ? " --
#Text=I did n't think too much of the post by itself ; but in the thread , it immediately took off .
#Text=A bunch of people ran with it and it became a hit in that thread .

#Text=It was actually the next day when I saw this thread - and so many people had said so many funny things ... it was like a relief valve had opened up and all this pent up frustration was flowing out .
#Text=Why did you decide to create the website " www.glennbeckrapedandmurderedayounggirlin1990.com " ?
#Text=There was so much energy in the Fark thread where the meme got its start .
#Text=I felt that it was something worth continuing ; that the frustration that was being expressed in that thread through the expression of the meme might actually become a force for change .

#Text=And even if it did n't manage to change anything , just the simple act of being a part of the meme might bring about a cathartic release of that frustration at all the stupidity of the pundits out there - of whom I think that Glenn Beck is really the worst of the worst .
#Text=The thing about Fark is - it 's a great site , but it 's all based on these threads .
#Text=Someone submits a link , and that gives you a thread to talk about it .
#Text=After something like 30 days , posting is cut off .
#Text=Also , the site is made up of a lot of links for the public threads , but many times that for the private threads .
#Text=It can be very hard to keep up with a single thread .
#Text=So I realized that if this meme were to take off - it needed a home .
#Text=I knew I needed to create a website , and a forum on that website , to facilitate whatever was going to happen .
